mil3.7.7:1.2: “bhante nagasena, kataram nu kho bahutaram punnam va apunnam va”ti?
mil3.7.7:1.5: “Apunnam kho, maharaja, karonto vippatisari hoti ‘papakammam maya katan’ti, tena papam na vaddhati.
mil3.7.7:1.6: Punnam kho, maharaja, karonto avippatisari hoti, avippatisarino pamojjam jayati, pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati, samahito yathabhutam pajanati, tena karanena punnam vaddhati.
mil3.7.7:1.7: Puriso kho, maharaja, chinnahatthapado bhagavato ekam uppalahattham datva ekanavutikappani vinipatam na gacchissati.
mil3.7.7:1.8: Iminapi, maharaja, karanena bhanami ‘punnam bahutaram, apunnam thokan’”ti.
